skills.title: TEDX
skills.description: SAE also conducts TEDxNITDurgapur a part of TED along with Literary Circle, which aims to provide a platform for a symphony of voices from a plethora of spheres to propagate ingenious ideas and thoughts.

skills.title: SAE IN AAROHAN
skills.description: SAE is also a part of Team Aavishkar which conducts Aarohan, NIT Durgapur's annual Techno-management fest,(second largest in eastern INDIA) which includes all facets of technical and festive enthusiasm.

skills.title: BAJA SAEINDIA
skills.description: Team NDORS is the official SAE BAJA team of NIT Durgapur representing the institute in BAJA SAEINDIA. The team involves auto-enthusiasts across different streams who share a common passion towards automobile engineering and racing.

skills.title: Events for freshers
skills.description: We aslo conduct worshops for new comers to devlop their interests in robotics,automation etc.
